main event: An observer in Franklin, Indiana saw an egg-shaped object hovering at approximately 500 feet and giving off a bright flash of light before disappearing at great speed.
interesting points: The observer reported strange lights in the sky for weeks prior to the main event., The object was observed for about 10 minutes., The observer had a previous sighting on November 30, 1966., The object made a deep humming sound similar to that of a power plant., Many people reportedly saw the object during its sighting time.
sighted object: an egg-shaped object with a window
witness description: A male observer, 26 years old, employed as a tooldie maker, with experience in accurate and fast observation.
